widget.name: Snackbar
widget.description: UI pattern from Material design. Snackbars provide brief messages about app processes at the bottom of the screen.

property.caption: Text label
property.description: Label to display inside the snackbar.

property.caption: Open Snackbar
property.description: Boolean which trigger the opening of the snackbar

property.caption: Autoclose
property.description: Autoclose after given amount of seconds

property.caption: Button label
property.description: Label to display for the action.

property.caption: May be closed?
property.description: Display a close button inside the snackbar. This also sets Open snackbar boolean to false.

property.caption: Leading aligned?
property.description: Positions the snackbar on the leading edge of the screen (left in LTR, right in RTL) instead of centered.
